features: All day comfort and protection available in five absorbencies with Tampax Pearl tampons up to eight hours
#1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand based on 2020 survey
Free of dyes, perfume, latex, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching natural rubber latex
Your flow is different every day. Your tampon should be, too
LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen
body.description: It’s time to Tampax and live your life without limits. Get incredible all day comfort and protection for up to eight hours with Tampax Pearl tampons. Choose from five different absorbencies to match your changing flow. Got leaks? Go up an absorbency. Uncomfortable to remove? Go down an absorbency. Designed with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen. Tampax Pearl Regular Absorbency provides protection you can feel good about. Free of dyes, perfume, latex, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching. Plus, inserting the tampon is made easy thanks to the applicator’s Anti-Slip Grip, while Tampax FormFit protection lets it gently expand to your individual shape. Ready to ditch the leaks? Get amazing protection with Tampax, the #1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand. Discover your perfect flow combo and get the protection you need. natural rubber latex based on 2020 survey

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find your Flow Combo If your tampon leaks just after a few hours, try going up an absorbency size for better comfort and protection*. Simply go up from Light to Regular or from your current size up to the next higher absorbency. Only Tampax Pearl tampons have five absorbencies so you can find your flow combo. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs Find your Flow Combo If your tampon is uncomfortable to remove, go down for a lighter absorbency*. Choose the right tampon absorbency throughout your period for better comfort and protection. Simply go down from Ultra to Super Plus or from your current size down to the next lightest absorbency. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs

Outstanding Protection with Tampax Pearl LeakGuard Braid Tampax Pearl tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks by channeling them back into the core. Controlled Insertion The Anti-Slip Grip lets you hold the applicator securely, so you can insert the tampon with its rounded tip comfortably and easily. Smooth Removal Layer A smooth layer makes for easy tampon removal and outstanding comfort during your period. FormFit Protection FormFit design gently expands to fit your individual shape, so you can feel comfortable and confident during your period.

Frequently Asked Questions How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons? Tampax Pearl Tampons have a special LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen, while a Smooth Removal Layer allows for easy removal. Plus, FormFit Protection gently expands to fit your individual shape. How long can I wear a tampon? You can wear a tampon for up to eight hours, but never leave it in for longer than that. If you usually sleep longer, set an alarm or just use a pad instead. How do I know which absorbency to use? Choosing the right tampon absorbency can make a big difference to be comfortable and avoid leaks. Take the Tampax Quiz on Tampax's website to learn more. What makes Tampax Pearl different from Tampax Pocket Pearl? Both Tampax Pearl and Tampax Pocket Pearl offer outstanding protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help prevent leaks. The main difference is that Tampax Pocket Pearl is compact in size so it fits in your pocket. When ready to use, extend the compact applicator to make it a full-size one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY FAVORITE BRAND AND CHEAPER THAN COSTCO
reviews.reviewText: Tampax Pearl Tampons in Regular Absorbency provide reliable protection and comfort during that time of the month. As a regular user of these tampons, I can confidently say that they have become my go-to choice for feminine hygiene products. Here's why:1. Comfortable Design: The Tampax Pearl tampons are thoughtfully designed with a smooth plastic applicator that makes insertion easy and comfortable. The rounded tip ensures a smooth entry, and the grip is easy to hold, even for beginners.2. Reliable Absorbency: The Regular absorbency is suitable for most days of my menstrual cycle. They offer effective protection without feeling bulky or uncomfortable. It's great to have that peace of mind, especially when you're on the go.3. Leak Protection: I've found that Tampax Pearl provides excellent leak protection. The tampon expands to fit your body's contours, and the braided string is strong and dependable, reducing the chances of any accidents.4. Discreet Packaging: The packaging is discreet and easy to stash in a purse or pocket. It's perfect for those moments when you need to change your tampon discreetly.5. Applicator Hygiene: The applicator is fully enclosed, which means I never have to worry about touching the tampon directly. This is a significant hygiene advantage over tampons with no applicators.6. Odor Control: Tampax Pearl tampons are unscented, which I appreciate. They offer reliable odor control, so I never have to be concerned about any unwanted smells.7. Availability: These tampons are widely available at most drugstores and supermarkets, making them convenient to purchase.8. Value for Money: While they may be a bit more expensive than generic tampons, the quality, comfort, and peace of mind they provide make them worth the investment.In summary, Tampax Pearl Tampons in Regular Absorbency have become a staple in my monthly routine. They offer reliable protection, are comfortable to use, and the design ensures discretion and ease of use. For anyone seeking a trustworthy and comfortable tampon option, I highly recommend Tampax Pearl Regular Absorbency tampons.

reviews.reviewText: I ordered 100 for around $20. I will obviously buy again. These are great tampons.If you look at what people ordered vs what they say they ordered, you will notice they got exactly what they ordered.$10 = 50 count (1 of box of 50)$20 = 100 count (2 of the 50 count boxes)
